DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Folate Levels Women Taking Oral Contraceptives
DOC.detailed_description: Studies show association increase folic acid ( synthetic form folate , B-vitamin ) intake reduction birth defect refer neural tube defect ( NTDs ) . If woman use contraception receive combination oral contraceptive folic acid , may benefit increase blood folate level , could reduce risk NTDs . This multi-center , double-blind study design study red blood cell folate level woman take oral contraceptive without folic acid . Patients receive oral contraceptive without folic acid 8 cycle 28 day . The study consist 2 part 4 cycle . All patient receive oral contraceptive throughout part study , patient may may receive folic acid combination oral contraceptive 1 part study . The concentration red blood cell folate determine laboratory test Cycles 1 , 2 , 4 , 5 , 6 8 . Safety evaluation ( incidence adverse event , electrocardiogram , physical examination , laboratory test ) perform throughout study . Patients may also participate optional portion study genetic material analyze see contain something would affect way folic acid use body . The study hypothesis woman take oral contraceptive folic acid increase level red blood cell folate compare woman take oral contraceptive without folic acid . Some woman receive oral contraceptive folic acid first four cycle transition oral contraceptive without folic acid Cycles 5-8 . In group woman , rate decrease red blood cell folate level measure . Norgestimate 250 microgram ( mcg ) -ethinyl estradiol 35 mcg tablet , without folic acid 400 mcg , 2 tablet take mouth daily 6:00 a.m. 10:00 a.m. 8 cycle 28 day duration total 224 day
DOC.criteria: Nonpregnant post menarcheal , premenopausal female agree use assign study medication contraception study Nonvegan Nonsmoker history tobacco use within 6 month Willing follow protocolspecific prohibition restriction regard diet , smoke use medication Have take multivitamin , folicacid contain supplement , highly fortify ( i.e. , > 200 mcg folic acid/serving ) cereal within 30 day entry study history presence blood clot vein , stroke blood clot disorder , liver tumor pervious contraceptive estrogen use , disease blood vessel brain heart disease , uncontrolled high blood pressure , cancer part body , diabetes mellitus complication flow blood body , jaundice , visual disturbance , liver disease , undiagnosed vaginal bleeding , gastric bypass surgery , ulcerative colitis digestive system disorder , abnormal thyroid function , Vitamin B 12 deficiency high red blood cell folate level , alcohol substance abuse , positive drug abuse recent use hormonal contraceptive weight reduction diet blood donation within 30 day study entry
